update second_hand_car_evaluate set vin = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parnter_id = #{parnter_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, saleman_id = #{saleman_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plate_num = #{plate_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engine_num = #{engine_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_date = #{register_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, make_name = #{make_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_name = #{model_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trimId = #{trimId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, style_color = #{style_color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate_price = #{evaluate_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, query_time = #{query_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT} manufacturerGuidePrice = #{manufacturerGuidePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dateOfProduction = #{dateOfProduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manufacturerName = #{manufacturerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate_json = #{evaluate_json,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mileage = #{mileage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicle_type = #{vehicle_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_id = #{city_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ocr_id = #{ocr_id,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from second_hand_car_evaluate s where 1=1 and CASE WHEN #{maxGroupLevel} = 0 THEN false when #{maxGroupLevel} = 1 then s.saleman_id in
#{item}
else true end and vin like concat('%',#{queryVIN},'%') and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(query_time) order by query_time desc

select s.id as id, s.vin as vin, s.trimId as trimId, s.style_color as style_color, s.owner as owner, s.make_name as make_name, s.model_name as model_name, s.name as name, s.evaluate_price as evaluate_price, DATE_FORMAT(s.query_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) as query_time, e.name as saleman_name, p.name as parnter_name from second_hand_car_evaluate s left join employee e on e.id = s.saleman_id left join partner p on p.id = s.parnter_id
CASE WHEN #{maxGroupLevel} = 0 THEN false when #{maxGroupLevel} = 1 then s.saleman_id in
#{item}
else true end and (vin like concat('%',#{carInfo},'%') or s.name like concat('%',#{carInfo},'%'))
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(query_time)
and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) > date(query_time)
order by query_time desc

SELECT base_area.`area_name` FROM `loan_order` LEFT JOIN `vehicle_information` ON `loan_order` .`vehicle_information_id` = vehicle_information.`id` LEFT JOIN `base_area` ON vehicle_information.`apply_license_plate_area` = base_area.`area_id` where order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT base_area.`parent_area_name` FROM `loan_order` LEFT JOIN `vehicle_information` ON `loan_order` .`vehicle_information_id` = vehicle_information.`id` LEFT JOIN `base_area` ON vehicle_information.`apply_license_plate_area` = base_area.`area_id` where order_id = #{orderId}
